channel.title: mlb on Ross A. Baker
channel.description: Recent content in mlb on Ross A. Baker

item.description: Problem: for weeks, I've only been able to listen in Spanish on the Android MLB app. The English feed hangs indefinitely "Buffering". This is a widely reported issue. Solution: select the English station and hit the rewind 10 seconds button. It starts immediately. I might keep a couple innings a day in Spanish to keep sharpening my skills! #MLB #Android

Where are all the #sports fans at? That's the banter I'm missing most. I might spin off a more personal identity so I don't alienate my fellow propellerheads. #MLB #NFL #NBA #NHL #Soccer #CFB #CBB #Cubs #Bears #Pacers #Blackhawks #Hoosiers #iufb #iubb
